      • AsciiShape

        public AsciiShape(boolean triangle,
          int height,
          int width,
          char symbol)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        triangle - true if a triangle shape, else a rectangle
        height - number of rows in the shape
        width - max width of the shape
        symbol - symbol to use for printing the shape
